name: DisplayGraph

aliases.name: Graph
aliases.comment:
A graph is s record with two fields - list of vertices
and a list of edges.
aliases.type: { vertices : List DisplayGraph.Vertex , edges : List DisplayGraph.Edge }

aliases.name: Vertex
aliases.comment: A vertex is s record with two fields, an integer id and a string label.

values.name: graphDisplay
values.comment:
graphDisplay takes a number and a graph as arguments
and returns an SVG representation of the graph. The number is
a scale factor. If the scale is 1, the graph is centered in a 2x2 square.
